//.NOTE: This is brief documentation on the usage for each devDependency and dependency in the Comet system

devDependencies.gulp: The task runner for the project
devDependencies.gulp-eslint: Validates and catches errors in JS files
devDependencies.gulp-sass-lint: Lint scss source files to conform to design system coding standards
devDependencies.js-beautify: Used in index.js to correctly indent and format code examples (both HTML and CSS)
devDependencies.marked: Used to process markdown -> HTML via a custom nunjucks filter defined in index.js
devDependencies.semver: Used to analyze the current Semantic Version of the repository and generate corresponding 'x' releases (see Gruntfile.js for more)
devDependencies.strip-indent: Removes indentation from multiline screens. Used to format code snippets correctly
devDependencies.yamljs: Aids in converting tokens.yaml to JSON

dependencies.clipboard: Enables 'copy to clipboard' behavior for Code Snippet Documentation
dependencies.svg4everybody: Polyfills browser support for the SVG <use> technique, used with Comet's icon sprite
